name: HellRain (Ace Savaid)
description:
Made for a game jam with the theme of Hell.

How long can you survive the heat of hell with your only aid being... raining water bottles?

Collect water bottles in the netherworld to beat the heat and beware of the monsters trying to end your run.  In defense you can fire water bullets at them, at the cost of loosing your own hydration.

Your score will give you tokens to use in the upgrades shop.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

All code and assets made by me.
